author: Steven Brown
comment: So far so good. Kinda sucks that I'm a premium member yet the wear app wasn't allowing me the full premium experience. Small price to pay. So. I'm interested to see were the further development with this app. Bosses and customers really get bees in their bonnet when mobile are accessed  on the shop floor. I normally allow the playlist to ride until the wheels fall off. Yet this app allows me to control the mobile in an unconventional manner.
title: Wearable spotify control

author: Robert Benn
comment: Nice handy app. I work out at the gym and love to just say an Artist name and Michael Buble! It starts playing! It would be nice if you can add queues! *update* starting to lose connection and not reading sodify. Delete and restart, works then will not communicate.
title: Asus Watch

author: Arlene Budiardjono
comment: Paid for premium to be able to choose the songs I wanted rather than shuffle a playlist. When I go into "Current Playlist" and select a song it does not play the song I choose (yes I made sure I was not pressing a different song). It plays another song from the same playlist. This is a huge problem, devs. Fix it and this app would be great for the Moto 360 and worth 5 stars. Edit: the song I selected, the song playing, and the song displayed are all different. Yikes.

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: We will fix this soon. Please stay tuned.

title: Huge Problem

author: Marcus Goosey
comment: I swiped left, hit chose playlist, hit the one I wanted and nothing happened... I dont have spotify premium but shouldnt it just start playing through the playlist on shuffle??? Otherwise i see no way for the app to be useful without premium.. EDIT: Brought spotify premium and its workin very well now, could be a bit smoother but does the job nicely
title: Think you need premium

author: Daimen Worrall
comment: OK, so i got the app and bought the paid version.  It's a nice little app - more reliable than the default watch music control and has more features.  However, one thing that really frustrates me is choosing a song on the playlist and it resetting my position every time. It should remember where i was scrolled to on the playlist.  If this is fixed i will up my rating.  Thanks.

author: Jack Wolford
comment: Apparently this app only works on a few smart watch devices. I tried to email for support got no response. Read the full description before purchase and make sure it is compatible with your device. I would like a refund but i wont hold my breath.
title: Does not work on my gear fit 2

comment: Does not allow you to play offline Spotify on your smartwatch as it claims to do. And unable to get refund surprisingly even though it does not do what it says it is supposed to do with all settings as described. Should be removed from Google Play if unable to get refunded. Feel scammed.
title: Dont waste your money

author: Marie G. Golubski-Allen
comment: I need a refund doesn't play music on my LG Urbane Android Wear Version only on my phone both the phone and the watch are connected. I have the box checked for Device Broadcast Status on the Spotify app I have a premium account on Spotify. On your app on my phone I have the box checked for beta version premium version and still can't hear any music on my watch. If your app is only to be used as a remote control than you need to let everyone know that ahead of time so they don't waste their time and money.
title: Is only a remote control for your phone

author: Ryan McElwee
comment: Can't hit play after pausiñg song on watch. Should be option to use as default music player. Sometimes I have something playing on Spotify, wear Spotify and google and its confusing as hell. Could be a bit faster. Only gets 2nd star cuz I like the layout.

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: We cannot use the default music player because we stream music from Spotify. Please review again. Thanks.

title: Room for improvement

author: Eashrak Zubair
comment: I love spotify so of course I got this app for my moto 360. It wasn't working at first so I uninstalled and reinstalled and bought the app. It worked right after I bought it, and then I tried it a couple of days later and it wasn't working. I tried restarting both my phone and my watch but it didn't work. I tried it today and it didn't work. I uninstalled and reinstalled, and guess what? It didn't work. I want a refund, thank you.
title: Doesn't work

author: earnestrobinsingh jacob
comment: I have a spotify premium account.but still cannot choose the song I want .it always goes to shuffle..I  pirchased your full version too.nothing changed. And the finding song by speaking never works .no feautres of repeat,shuffle,increasing or decreasing volume available on mylg g watch r .please refund the money

author: Jacob Ivener
comment: I had to uninstall and re-install this to get my playlists to show up (I was just getting a black screen the first time I installed it).  It works ok, now.  It would be nice to be able to see the folders I have in Spotify since all my playlists are organized in folders.  Also, if I pause a track, there isn't a play button that appears to continue playing (only the previous track, next track, and pause...which it's already paused).
title: Not bad, but needs a little work

author: Lee Gavin
comment: I think i have misinterpreted the description of what this app does.. I thought it would allow me to download/store my spotify songs on my watch so didn't need phone if was running...Can't see why you would need this when spotify have own function to control music from watch
title: Not really sure of its purpose- description misleading

author: Greg Hk
comment: Basic but functional interface. Does what it says, controls Spotify from your watch, however since the initial install have had intermittent problems, like other users have reported: problems with communicating with the phone, black screen, message saying Spotify has stopped. Once these have been fixed will be 5 stars
title: Works great but...

author: Kyle Hall
comment: Just got an LG Urbane today and tried buying the Premium version of this app. Every time I try, however, I get a "This payment method has been declined" message. I have tried several payment methods but all throw the same error.  UPDATE (8/4/15) - Tried again today and it went through. Thanks for the fix!

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Hi Kyle. This was a Google Play issue. Please try it again.

comment: Sometimes one can make a song play in Spotify but mostly not. Neither the app on phone or watch is responding to any button press. I couldn't chose a Playlist. Skipping songs, no response. A fine idea packaged in an utterly useless crappy app! Deleted.
title: Utterly useless crap!

author: Carlos Asenvader
comment: Good app much better than the default app but my one problem is i can,t get it to quit when finished. I swipe it away but it keeps starting up again only way i can get it to quit is by restarting my watch (SW3)  So 3 stars because of the quit issue.

author: David Bowditch
comment: Can say this app is completely useless for me, when launching the app on the watch it can't connect to my phone. Luckily if I launch Spotify on my phone first my watch can control Spotify without the app!
title: Needs work

author: lynda pearson
comment: it could be a great app but i have to have the screen of my phone on for the app to launch and the music to play otherwise it will not play the music requested by voice command or skip tracks using touch unless the screen is on, i dont want my screen to be constantly on whilst im listening to music. dissapointed, if this could be sorted out it would definitely get 5 stars!  :) please fix this!
title: paid for app but doesnt work properly!

author: Victor Resto
comment: The overall gist of the app is solid, but certain features need tweaking. For example, starting the app outright from the watch has a tendency to have an inconsistent start. Sometimes it launches. Sometimes it doesn't. The voice function also needs a little tweaking. When I try to launch a radio from the watch, it doesn't work, even though that is one of the listed commands available.  I also think the price may be a little high for the premium service. A buck to a buck 50 would be reasonable. LG G Watch R
title: Not bad... Needs improvements...

author: stanley damanley
comment: This is a joke. No support no nothing. I bought a polar m600 to enjoy offline spotify during runs. But NOTHING WORKS. Terrible interface and it just works as a bad spotify remote. No offline playback. And no explanation what premium upgrade for this app gives you. I'm a premium spotify account user and for the First time I've ever considered moving to Google play music... Get your act together!!!!

author: Dave Payne
comment: Paid for the premium upgrade and crashes when I try and play anything.. hopefully will be able to uninstall and get a refund 😞
title: Doesn't work

author: Peter Moss
comment: I love the app so far. It seems to play my music much louder than the official app too, which is a bonus. However, when I hit pause then hit pause again it doesn't start my music. I have to go back to my phone and hit play, which kind of defeats the point of the software. Also, when I get a call the music continues playing. If these issues were fixed then defo 5 stars. I wrote an email to the devs 7 days ago about this but not heard back yet, hence my review.

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Please check your spam folder. We wrote an email. Write us again if you did not get an answer. Please review again. Thank you.

title: Can't restart after pause and doesn't pause for a call.

author: Ethan Featherstone
comment: Offline playback does not work, even with premium. At best this is a poor remote. I tried to get the offline to function to work and it did not. I tried to force stop the app on my phone and watch, then restarted both devices. Nothing.

author: Chris Price
comment: "Current playlist" instantly crashes the app, and more often than not "choose playlist" returns a black screen. When it works it's pretty handy, though the UI could be made more material-like.
title: Good... When it works

author: rudy trisno wadi
comment: Paid for premium, but i can't control my spotify list, navigation still not working, very useless apps, when developer will fix it? You very hungry with our money, but i think you are not fair with quality is like stupid choice apps yo spend money

author: Bacchus Beha
comment: And crashes a lot. Since the crash happens on the watch I get no option to send a report. Also after upgrading to premium the primary problem is the battery drain which is atleast twice that of the standard app, and the drain happens on the phone, it does fine on the watch as far as I can tell.

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Please send crash reports or write an email to support@wearable-software.com, so we can fix the issues. Please review again. Thanks!

title: Very power hungry...

author: Tshepo Legodi
comment: Useless I'm switching to google music at least I can load songs to my watch and go for a run without taking my phone along. Spotify wake up before you lose more customers to Google and Apple

author: Brad White
comment: Connectivity issues seem to persist. I just can't see how this app supplements an already great music service.
title: Not What I Expected

author: Ciprian Gorongia
comment: it crashes every time i start it
title: doesn t work

author: Isak Lundström
comment: How do I make a playlist offline accessible. I have premium and I use offline lists on my phone every day. Just won't work on this wear app
title: Won't work

author: tha s
comment: Paid for the beta. Everytime I tried searching for a song it goes into error and exit out. I want my refund back.
title: Doesn't work

author: Peter Walker
comment: Wouldn't even open. Watch vibrated, then nothing. No indication of what went wrong.

author: Emerson Moore
comment: U guys didn't do it right should have made it an add on for the default app make the app native for both the phone and the ware and it would be much better not worth downloading
title: Ware app suck

author: Scott Fitzpatrick
comment: Got a Sony SmartWatch 3, every time I try and open the app on the phone it just takes me back to the home screen and does nothing

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: You have to start a playlist on watch. You need the phone app for one time spotify login.

title: Does not work for me

author: Taino PR
comment: I installed this app and bought  the paid  version but it does not respond.  Im using  it it with a note 4 and the moto  360 2nd gen. Won't  pause or move  to next  song.  How can i get a refund?
title: Doesn't  respond

author: Paul Salmon
comment: Doesn't work. I'm a premium member. Don't waste your time downloading this tripe.

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Please describe what you mean with 'doesn't work'. Next time, please write an email first. We will help you with running the app correctly on your device if you contact us at 'support@wearable-software.com'. Thank you.

title: Pile of cack

author: Paul Hill
comment: Worked initially but not since. Keep getting error message when trying to choose playlist can't forward to next track or pause etc. Uninstalled
title: Doesn't work

author: Andrew R
comment: App doesn't allow spotify to play in my huawei watch speakers and instead plays through my phone. This defeats the purpose of this app because the spotify app already does this.

author: Steffy S. Zuko
comment: Bullsh*t app. Doesn't work for my smartwatch or my phone. Paid for the premium service as well, does not load up at all. Galaxy Note 5 and Scinex SW20.
